'''Eric Stirpe''' is a writer and director. He is known as a writer in ''[[Minecraft: Story Mode]]'' and ''[[Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two]]''. His other works include ''Tales from the Borderlands'' (2014), ''Batman: The Telltale Series'' (2016), ''High on Life'' (2022), and ''The Walking Dead: Season Two'' (2013).<ref name="imdb">[https://www.imdb.com/name/nm4939759/ Eric Stirpe] - IMDb</ref>

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
{{expand section|Should include writing processes in episodes he actually helped in writing.}}
He is one of the writers in both seasons of {{MCSM}}. He is often cited as a source for behind-the-scenes information and clarifications about the story, characters, and development choices.

== Trivia ==
* Back when {{SMEp|5}} came out, Eric Stirpe made bottles of Ivor's Eversauce and gave them as gifts to all team members who worked on the game. The bottles' labels were designed by him and the episode's lead designer, Molly Maloney.<ref>{{tumblr|stirpicus|150688196386|Back when episode 5 came out, I made bottles of...|September 20, 2016}}</ref><ref>{{tumblr|stirpicus|804377945070256128|Hi Mr.Stirpe :)<br>you wouldn't happen to have the jpeg of the eversauce bottle labels laying around somewhere do you?|December 30, 2025}}</ref>
